/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The road is filled with a variety of vehicles, including cars, trucks, and buses, all moving in different directions, creating a dynamic tableau of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. In the background, buildings and trees can be seen, adding depth and context to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the vehicles and the greenery in the background.
